reviews.review_msg: Awesome teacher, you don't need the textbook.  Just study her powerpoint notes and you will do extremely well and also she posts them online!

Very interesting class and he teaches well. I only got a B though cause I studied mostly from the textbook. Lecture is recorded but you have to attend class because of iclicker tutorial quizzes each lecture which is easy and worth 10% I think. Lots of memorization esp. for the 1st half (theories etc)and there's also a paper!

She uses iclickers to take attendance so basically no weekly quizzes or anything. The grading syllabus contains attendance, 2 mid terms and a final. 25% each. Pretty straight forward. She doesn't use a mike but instead she sends out notes every week. Tries to make class interesting. Swears a lot.
